data.name: AutoCheckUpdate
data.value: Autocheck for program update

data.name: AutoCheckUpdateDescription
data.value: Autocheck for update on program start and every day

data.name: AutoSelectMatch
data.value: Autoselect first match

data.name: AutoSelectMatchDescription
data.value: Autoselection of first match of filter in clip text.

data.name: Autostart
data.value: Autostart program on user logon

data.name: AutostartPath
data.value: Application autostart command line

data.name: AutostartPathDescription
data.value: Click OK to update this command from current start path

data.name: ClearFiltersOnClose
data.value: Clear filters on main window close

data.name: ClipListSimpleDraw
data.value: Fast and simple list draw

data.name: ClipListSimpleDrawDescription
data.value: Clip list will be drawn fast without highlighting filter matches and picture samples

data.name: ClipTempFileFolder
data.value: Folder for clip temp files

data.name: ClipTempFileFolderDescription
data.value: Folder for saving temp files of clips. Leave empty to use standart temp folder. Usually can be usefull in portable mode.

data.name: CopyTextInAnyWindowOnCTRLF3
data.value: Copy text from any window by Control+F3

data.name: CopyTextInAnyWindowOnCTRLF3Description
data.value: Copy selected text from any window when Control+F3 is pressed. This hotkey usually is used in text editors to search selected string. Key press will be processed by the window.

data.name: CurrentPath
data.value: Application current start path

data.name: DatabaseFile
data.value: Database file

data.name: DatabaseFileDescription
data.value: You can change database filename to switch to other clipboard history. Leave blank to use standart database file "db.sqlite" in application user settings folder.

data.name: DatabaseSize
data.value: Database size MB

data.name: DefaultFont
data.value: Default font

data.name: DefaultFontDescription
data.value: Font for clip list and default for clip text. Double click to change it.

data.name: FastWindowOpen
data.value: Fast window open

data.name: FastWindowOpenDescription
data.value: Fast window opening by using some tricks. Can lead to some minor problems in window opening/closing.

data.name: GlobalHotkeyCompareLastClips
data.value: Hotkey to compare last clips

data.name: GlobalHotkeyCompareLastClipsDescription
data.value: Use this hot key in any program to launch application for comparing last 2 clips

data.name: GlobalHotkeyIncrementalPaste
data.value: Hotkey to paste and select next

data.name: GlobalHotkeyIncrementalPasteDescription
data.value: Use this hot key in any program to paste current clip from Clip Angel list and select next/upper clip which will be shown in tray tooltip

data.name: GlobalHotkeyOpenCurrent
data.value: Hotkey to open window with no changes

data.name: GlobalHotkeyOpenCurrentDescription
data.value: Use this hot key in any program to open ClipAngel window with no changes in filter and clip selection. Press again to close the window.

data.name: GlobalHotkeyOpenFavorites
data.value: Hotkey to open window with favorites

data.name: GlobalHotkeyOpenFavoritesDescription
data.value: Use this hot key in any program to show ClipAngel window with favorites only filter. Press again to close the window.

data.name: GlobalHotkeyOpenLast
data.value: Hotkey to open window with reset

data.name: GlobalHotkeyOpenLastDescription
data.value: Use this hot key in any program to open ClipAngel window, clear filters and select last clip. Press again to close the window.

data.name: GlobalHotkeyPasteText
data.value: Hotkey to paste plain text

data.name: GlobalHotkeyPasteTextDescription
data.value: Use this hot key in any program to paste last clip as plain text

data.name: GlobalHotkeySimulateInput
data.value: Hotkey to simulate keyboard input

data.name: GlobalHotkeySimulateInputDescription
data.value: Use this hot key in any program to simulate keyboard input of last clip

data.name: GlobalHotkeySwitchMonitoring
data.value: Hotkey to switch clipboard monitoring

data.name: GlobalHotkeySwitchMonitoringDescription
data.value: Use this hot key in any program to switch clipboard monitoring (capturing changes) by ClipAngel

data.name: HistoryDepthDays
data.value: History depth days

data.name: HistoryDepthDaysDescription
data.value: Maximum number of days non favorite clips are stored. Deletion is executed on start, every day, on settings apply. 0 - do not delete.

data.name: HistoryDepthNumber
data.value: History depth number

data.name: HistoryDepthNumberDescription
data.value: Maximum number of stored non favorite clips. Deletion is executed on start, every day, on settings apply. 0 - do not delete.

data.name: HtmlEditor
data.value: HTML file editor application

data.name: HtmlEditorDescription
data.value: Used in "Open file" command for clip. Leave empty to use default OS application for edit HTML files.

data.name: IgnoreApplicationsClipCapture
data.value: Ignored applications in clip capture

data.name: IgnoreApplicationsClipCaptureDescription
data.value: Do not capture clips from this applications

data.name: IgnoreExclusiveFormatClipCapture
data.value: Do not capture "Clipboard Viewer Ignore" format

data.name: IgnoreExclusiveFormatClipCaptureDescription
data.value: Do not capture clip with "Clipboard Viewer Ignore" format present. This format is usually used by password managers when copying passwords to clipboard. Sometimes it may be usefull to switch it OFF temporary.

data.name: ImageEditor
data.value: Image (PNG) file editor application

data.name: ImageEditorDescription
data.value: Used in "Open file" command for clip. Leave empty to use default OS application for edit image (PNG) files.

data.name: Language
data.value: Language

data.name: LanguageDescription
data.value: User interface language

data.name: MaxCellsToCaptureFormattedText
data.value: Max cells to capture formatted text

data.name: MaxCellsToCaptureFormattedTextDescription
data.value: When capturing clip from cells (Excel), capture generated formatted text if number of cells is lower than this. 0 - do not capture. Generation of formatted text consumes CPU. If you experience high CPU load, set lower value.

data.name: MaxCellsToCaptureImage
data.value: Max cells to capture image

data.name: MaxCellsToCaptureImageDescription
data.value: When capturing clip from cells (Excel), capture generated image if number of cells is lower than this. 0 - do not capture. Generation of image consumes CPU. If you experience high CPU load, set lower value.

data.name: MaxClipSizeKB
data.value: Max clip size KB

data.name: MaxClipSizeKBDescription
data.value: Clips greater this size will not be captured

data.name: MonospacedFont
data.value: Monospaced font

data.name: MonospacedFontDescription
data.value: Monospaced font in clip text field. Could be overloaded by RTF native formatting. Not appliable to HTML native formatting.

data.name: MoveCopiedClipToTop
data.value: Move clips to top after use

data.name: MoveCopiedClipToTopDescription
data.value: Move copied from list or fully pasted clips to top of list

data.name: NumberOfClips
data.value: Number of clips

data.name: NumberOfClipsDescription
data.value: Current number of clips in database

data.name: PlaySoundOnClipCapture
data.value: Play sound on clip capture

data.name: PlaySoundOnClipCaptureDescription
data.value: Playing standard Windows sound when clip is successfully captured. Can be annoying

data.name: ReadWindowTitles
data.value: Read window titles

data.name: ReadWindowTitlesDescription
data.value: Read window titles from clip sources. Uncheck this setting to avoid crashes of program on some systems.

data.name: ReplaceDuplicates
data.value: Replace duplicates

data.name: ReplaceDuplicatesDescription
data.value: Keep clips unique by content. Update existing dublicate clip instead of creating new.

data.name: RestoreCaretPositionOnFocusReturn
data.value: Restore caret position on focus return

data.name: RestoreCaretPositionOnFocusReturnDescription
data.value: Enable this to try restore caret position after focus is returned to target window. This is usefull for textboxes which select all text after loosing focus

data.name: RtfEditor
data.value: RTF file editor application

data.name: RtfEditorDescription
data.value: Used in "Open file" command for clip. Leave empty to use default OS application for edit RTF files.

data.name: SearchCaseSensitive
data.value: Search case sensitive

data.name: SearchCaseSensitiveDescription
data.value: Search filter case sensitive. For example "Pot" will match "Potato", but not "potato".

data.name: SearchIgnoreBigTexts
data.value: Search with ignore big texts

data.name: SearchIgnoreBigTextsDescription
data.value: Search with ignore big (visual size > 99 999 chars) text clips. It will speed up search.

data.name: SearchWildcards
data.value: Search "%" as any char sequence

data.name: SearchWildcardsDescription
data.value: Search char "%" from filter as any char sequence. For example filter "po%o" will match "potato".

data.name: SearchWordsIndependently
data.value: Search independent words

data.name: SearchWordsIndependentlyDescription
data.value: Search every word from filter independently. For example "pot web" will match "Our website sells potato".

data.name: ShowApplicationIconColumn
data.value: Show clip source icon column

data.name: ShowApplicationIconColumnDescription
data.value: Show column with icon from application where clip was copied

data.name: ShowNativeTextFormatting
data.value: Show native text formatting

data.name: ShowNativeTextFormattingDescription
data.value: Show native text formatting for RTF and HTML clips (CLTR+N)

data.name: ShowSecondaryColumns
data.value: Show secondary columns

data.name: ShowSecondaryColumnsDescription
data.value: Show secondary columns in list

data.name: ShowSizeColumn
data.value: Show visual clip weight column

data.name: ShowSizeColumnDescription
data.value: Column will show visual weight (number of digits in visual size) of clip

data.name: TextCompareApplication
data.value: Text compare application

data.name: TextCompareApplicationDescription
data.value: Leave empty to use automatic search application, which looks for Beyond Compare, ExamDiff Pro, WinMerge, Araxis Merge, DiffMerge, Kdiff3. Text compare command is %application% %file1% %file2%

data.name: TextEditor
data.value: Text (TXT) file editor application

data.name: TextEditorDescription
data.value: Used in "Open file" command for clip. Leave empty to use default OS application for edit text (TXT) files.

data.name: UseFormattingInDuplicateDetection
data.value: Use formatting in duplicate detection

data.name: UseFormattingInDuplicateDetectionDescription
data.value: Use native text formatting in duplicate detection. Else only plain text will be used for detecting duplicate of text clip

data.name: UserSettingsPath
data.value: Application user settings path

data.name: UserSettingsPathDescription
data.value: Files with user settings and default database file are here

data.name: WindowAutoPosition
data.value: Window auto position on open

data.name: WindowAutoPositionDescription
data.value: If possible, window will open near text caret (input), otherwise will place in center of active window

data.name: WordWrap
data.value: Word wrap

data.name: WordWrapDescription
data.value: Word wrap in clip text field (CTRL+W). Not appliable to HTML native formatting.
